pageProduct.name: OGX Biotin & Collagen Dry Shampoo 120g/200ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Drag to spin

General Information

Infuse a nutrient-rich blend with vitamin B7, biotin, collagen and hydrolyzed wheat protein, for oil absorption and gravity-defying volume. Reveal fresher, fuller-looking, beautiful hair.

Why you want it... Create lift and extend time between washes with this volume boosting formula.

Size: 200mL Net Wt. 120g

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

Warnings

Warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into eyes rinse thoroughly with water. Discontinue use and see a doctor if signs of irritation or rash appear. Keep out of reach of children. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal.
 
EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE. DO NOT SPRAY ON A NAKED FLAME OR ANY INCANDESCENT MATERIAL. KEEP AWAY FROM SOURCES OF IGNITION - NO SMOKING. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. PRESSURISED DISPENSER. PROTECT FROM SUNLIGHT AND DO NOT EXPOSE TO TEMPERATURES EXCEEDING 50°C. DO NOT PIERCE OR BURN, EVEN AFTER USE.

Ingredients

Ingredients: Butane, Isobutane, Propane, 2-Methylpentane, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Alcohol, Water, Quaternium-18 Bentonite, Fragrance, Biotin, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Laurdimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin.

Directions

What You Do... Shake well before and during use. Spray on lifted sections of dryhair, 20-30cm away from roots. Massage through roots to absorb excess oil.Brush through to distribute product evenly. Style as usual. Reapply as needed.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE. DO NOT SPRAY ON A NAKED FLAME OR ANY INCANDESCENT MATERIAL. KEEP AWAY FROM SOURCES OF IGNITION - NO SMOKING. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. PRESSURISED DISPENSER. PROTECT FROM SUNLIGHT AND DO NOT EXPOSE TO TEMPERATURES EXCEEDING 50°C. DO NOT PIERCE OR BURN, EVEN AFTER USE.
